concept.title: Pipeline Constants
concept.shortdesc: A pipeline constant is a constant that you define for the pipeline and that you can use in any stage in the pipeline. Define a pipeline constant when you have a value that you want to update easily, or that you want use more than once. currently can only use in stages, not metrics/alerts. Hari might add - check back.

conbody.p: pipeline constantsoverviewconstantspipeline constantsFor example, you might have an Expression Evaluator processor that calculates the total income for employees using .01 as a bonus percentage, as follows:${(record:value("/SALARY")) + (record:value("/SALARY")*.01)}
However, the bonus percentage changes regularly. So instead of using .01 directly in the expression, you can create a constant named Bonus with a value of .01.
